full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/22/2023 FORM G-325A (REV. 10-1-74) Y Form Approved ITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE OMB No. 43-R436 Immigration and Naturalization Service BIOGRAPHIC INFORMATION (Family name) (First name) (Middle name) MALE BIRTHDATE(Mo.-Day-Yr.)
